t: About us at K-Rain Manufacturing

t: K-Rain
s: Look across the industry and you’ll find a little bit of K-Rain innovation sprinkled into the competitive set. K-Rain holds over 100 patents specific to irrigation including the three-spring reversing mechanism still used today in most gear-driven sprinklers.

t: K-Rain Manufacturing Corporation Information

t: About Us - K-Rain
s: March 29, 2023 - We have been an Australian family owned business since 1966 and we recently celebrated our 50-year anniversary. With new management in 1991 our managing director Wally Edwards heightened the Australian culture in our company and widened the focus to irrigation, watering and garden light products.
